categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the Eliza Project

content.text:
Several bug fixes and improvements have been made to the Eliza project recently:

- Fixed a timeout issue with the Discord service unregister functionality (PR #4450)
- Fixed client scroll bars (PR #4465)
- Added elizadb to .gitignore to prevent it from being tracked in version control (PR #4464)
- Fixed detection for bunx and npx commands (PR #4463)
- Updated broken documentation links in the Eliza documentation (PR #4460)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository recently:

1. PR #4462: A new feature by samarth30 titled "Feat/jimmy project manager" that appears to be adding project management functionality.

2. PR #4466: A feature by bowtiedbluefin to create a Morpheus plugin for the Eliza system.

3. PR #4450: A bug fix by standujar addressing a timeout issue with the Discord service unregistration process.

4. PR #4465: A fix by ChristopherTrimboli that addresses issues with client scroll bars in the application interface.

Between May 6-7, 2025, the elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity with 6 new pull requests, of which 5 were successfully merged. The repository also received 1 new issue during this period. The project maintained an active community with 11 contributors participating during this timeframe.
sources: text: From 2025-05-06 to 2025-05-07, elizaos/eliza had 6 new PRs (5 merged), 1 new issues, and 11 active contributors.

categories.title: Issue #4461: settings.discord.autoPost is not implemented yet in eliza v2

content.text: GitHub issue #4461 reports that the settings.discord.autoPost feature is not yet implemented in eliza v2. This issue was opened by user POKENA7 in the elizaOS/eliza repository.

The provided source only mentions 'Top contributors for elizaOS/eliza' without providing any specific details about who these contributors are or their contributions. Without additional information, it's not possible to generate a detailed summary of the top contributors to the elizaOS/eliza project.
